articles.author: Maria Sacchetti, Adam Taylor, Marianne LeVine, Dan Lamothe
articles.title: Lawyers scramble to prevent Trump from deporting migrants to Libya - The Washington Post
articles.description: A court filing says the U.S. is preparing to deport people from Southeast Asia to Libya, a troubled nation “notorious for its human rights violations.”
articles.content: Lawyers representing a number of immigrants asked a federal judge on Wednesday to urgently block the Trump administration from deporting a group of people to Libya, Saudi Arabia or any other country … [+4857 chars]

articles.author: University College London
articles.title: T. rex's direct ancestor crossed from Asia to North America, new study finds - Phys.org
articles.description: Tyrannosaurus rex evolved in North America, but its direct ancestor came from Asia, crossing a land bridge connecting the continents more than 70 million years ago, according to a new study led by UCL researchers.
articles.content: Tyrannosaurus rex evolved in North America, but its direct ancestor came from Asia, crossing a land bridge connecting the continents more than 70 million years ago, according to a new study led by UC… [+6212 chars]
